name: Meteor Master
description:
Strafe through the stars and avoid imminent danger!

Pilot a spaceship that must traverse past incoming asteroids to reach its final destination. With an orbital shield system, you can stay in one piece while flying swiftly through interstellar space.

This game is made by a 2 person team (kejuu and Senpai-senpai) for the Fresh Game Jam with the theme of "Galaxy".

Kejuu - Coding, Music, SFX

M.E./Senpai-Senpai  - Art &  Animation
